name: design-pattern-udemy
description: E-Learning Platform with Design Patterns - Full Stack Application

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd Executable && npm install && cd ../Source/frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run docker:up
scripts.clean: cd Executable && npm run clean && cd ../Source/frontend && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../backend && rm -rf node_modules dist
